form.official-title: To eliminate the discretion of the Secretary of Homeland Security regarding the definition of the term official purpose as it applies to drivers’ licenses and personal identification cards, and for other purposes.

section.header: Definition of official purpose for drivers’ licenses and personal identification cards

subsection.text: Section 201(3) of the Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act for Defense, the Global War on Terror, and Tsunami Relief, 2005 (Public Law 109–13; 119 Stat. 312; 49 U.S.C. 30301 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking includes but is not limited to and inserting means;
by striking aircraft, entering and inserting aircraft, and entering; and
by striking , and any other purposes that the Secretary shall determine.

subsection.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Homeland Security shall submit to Congress a report on the implementation of the amendments made by this Act.
